knimeNode.name: Logistic Regression Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts the response using a general regression model.

fullDescription.intro: Predicts the response using a logistic regression model. The node needs to be connected to a logistic regression node model and some test data. It is only executable if the test data contains the columns that are used by the learner model. This node appends a new columns to the input table containing the prediction for each row.
fullDescription.option: The number of appended columns is equal to the number of categories of the target column. They represent the probability that a row in the input data falls in a specific category.

ports.inPort: Table for prediction. Missing values will give missing values in the output.
ports.outPort: Table from input with an additional prediction column.
